Question: Npath Games Oyun Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Npath Games Oyun Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi

Product: MSI Claw

- Intel Core Ultra 5 or Core Ultra 7 155H and Arc graphics
- 40W max power draw
- 53WHr battery with 2-hour full power mode
- Expected launch in the first half of the year
Summary_cn:
Npath Games 游戏技术股份有限公司

产品：MSI Claw

- 搭载 Intel Core Ultra 5 或 Core Ultra 7 155H 和 Arc 图形
- 最大功耗 40W
- 53WHr 电池，带有 2 小时全功率模式
- 预计在今年上半年发布
